text: Clicker 33: power method The power method computes: @ the dominant eigenpair of a matrix using matrix-vector products @ the dominant eigenpair of a matrix using matrix decompositions @ all eigenvalues of a matrix using matrix-vector products @ all eigenvalues of a matrix using matrix decompositions @ the eigenpair of a matrix with eigenvalue closest to zero, using matrix-vector products Ascher & Greif (UBC Computer Science) A First Course in Numerical Methods CPSC 302, Fall 2023 13/29 Your Answer: A
